SAINT: <NAME Nominative="Commemoration des defunts" Cmd="nday != -50 || nday != -57 && !(doy >= 287 && doy <= 294)"/> <NAME Nominative="Samedi de Souvien" Cmd="nday == -57 && !(doy >= 287 && doy <= 294)"/> <NAME Nominative="Samedi de la commemoration de tous les saints" Cmd="nday == -50 && !(doy >= 287 && doy <= 294)"/> <NAME Nominative="Samedi de Demetrius, commemoration des defunts" Cmd="doy >= 287 && doy <= 294"/>
